title: Improving error monitoring with AI
description: Tillman Elser, AI/ML lead at Sentry, joins Ryan for a conversation about improving error monitoring with AI and ML. They talk through the challenges of analyzing stack traces, the innovative use of embeddings to improve error grouping, the trial-and-error process of developing algorithms, and where Sentry’s AI capabilities are headed next.
author: Eira May
excerpt: Tillman Elser, AI/ML lead at Sentry, joins Ryan for a conversation about improving error monitoring with AI and ML. They talk through the challenges of analyzing stack traces, the innovative use of embeddings to improve error grouping, the trial-and-error process of developing algorithms, and where Sentry’s AI capabilities are headed next.

html:
March 18, 2025

Tillman Elser, AI/ML lead at Sentry, joins Ryan for a conversation about improving error monitoring with AI and ML. They talk through the challenges of analyzing stack traces, the innovative use of embeddings to improve error grouping, the trial-and-error process of developing algorithms, and where Sentry’s AI capabilities are headed next.

Sentry is an application monitoring software. Explore the Sentry docs or get started in the sandbox.

Connect with Tillman on LinkedIn. You can also read his posts on the Sentry blog.

Listeners, how do you handle stack traces? How do you trace the root cause? Let us know at podcast@stackoverflow.com.

Sentry user? The company would love to hear your feedback. Let them know what you think on Discord.

TRANSCRIPT
